Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga claimed three wickets and was named Player of the Match.
Hasaranga dismissed Usman Ghani, Rashid Khan, and Mujeeb Ur Rahman.
Hasaranga finished with figures of 3/13 and took an excellent catch to dismiss Najibullah Zadran.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman clean bowled Pathum Nissanka with a remarkable delivery.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 31 runs.
Dhananjaya de Silva scored an unbeaten 66 to guide Sri Lanka to victory.
Gulbadin Naib was comically run out after dropping his bat mid-pitch.
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka remains in contention for a semi-final berth but needs to defeat England and have other results go their way.
Afghanistan's tournament is over, with their final match against Australia being their last chance for a victory.
